mapper.select: select a.* from t_rabbitmq a,t_xf_mq b where a.id = b.mqid and b.xfid = #{xfid}
select a.*,c.xfsh from t_rabbitmq a,t_xf_mq b,t_xf c where a.id = b.mqid and b.xfid = c.id and c.yxbz = '1'
select a.*,c.xfsh from t_rabbitmq a,t_xf_mq b,t_xf c where a.id = b.mqid and b.xfid = c.id and c.yxbz = '1' and c.xfsh = #{xfsh}
